backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining file, folder, user profile, and mission data models with related CRUD operations and access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required UI icon replacement and listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file providing short summaries for various frontend components and utilities.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation of the creation and validation of a draft baseline matching Live version 114 exactly.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers defining extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA meta tags, icons, and root mount point loading the frontend app.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Post‑restoration change‑freeze notice restricting modifications until explicit user approval.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, theme, and startup configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing minimal precaching, runtime caching, and network-first fetch handling.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist confirming full restoration of frontend behavior and structure to Live version 114.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring themes and providers, showing an intro screen after successful login.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: Error UI component displaying classified actor initialization errors with retry and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: SVG-based animated gallery icon with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed decorative horizontal line near the bottom of the viewport.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog prompting users to retry opening or download a file when a browser blocks external window opens.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Provides a dialog to preview files of various types and perform actions like open, download, move, and delete.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles file uploads and adding external links with progress tracking and validation.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Displays a floating button to open the folders interface.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Dialog for listing, creating, renaming, and deleting folders, with swipe actions and validation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with attribution and external link.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full-screen viewer for navigating, sharing, downloading, and organizing files with gesture support.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays a grid of files with selection, long-press actions, navigation, and integration with viewer and folder dialogs.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with theme toggle, auth dropdown, app title, and progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Intro splash screen that animates a logo and triggers a completion callback after timed transitions.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when a browser blocks opening a link, offering retry and copy-to-clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button that triggers Internet Identity login and shows loading state during authentication.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full‑screen mission editor displaying mission data, tasks, attachments, and save/delete actions with file and link viewers.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating a new mission with title and task management before submission.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating action button that opens the missions interface with animated target icon.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full‑screen mission list view with creation, deletion, selection, progress display, and swipe actions.
frontend/src/components/MissionTargetIco: Small wrapper component rendering a styled Target icon.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for listing missions and moving selected file IDs to a chosen mission with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving files into folders or back to the main collection, showing folder list and handling mutations.
Component enabling horizontal swipe gestures to reveal edit/delete actions with pointer event handling.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Global upload progress bar showing total progress and file count during ongoing uploads.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Intro screen presenting app purpose and sign‑in prompt with a mission-themed visual layout.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Provides actor initialization, retry logic, and error handling for backend access tied to Internet Identity.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Context managing upload batches, per-file progress, and aggregated upload state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an actor based on identity, initializing access control and invalidating related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth, including login, logout, and initializing stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer (touch) and updates reactively.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, and updating missions via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for future note-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating files and folders, using the backend actor and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark themes, color tokens, and touch interaction optimizations.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function to merge Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main page composing UI sections, running smoke tests in dev, and orchestrating data fetching based on auth and actor state.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Defines user-facing actor initialization messages and utilities for classifying backend/actor errors.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Provides helpers for opening external URLs and downloading files via browser APIs.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Determines how files should open based on MIME type, including viewer, office preview, or download behavior.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Categorizes files by MIME type and provides previewability checks and human-readable labels.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Offers diagnostics for React Query cache states and logs mutation lifecycle details for missions.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs backend smoke tests covering folder creation, mission creation, file upload, and listing verification.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and enabling custom plugins.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical list of all frontend files defining the official Live v114 baseline.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, and pending requests for the mission icon update.
